text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
We're here. This is the last day. 
Let's finish this photo shoot on a high!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. Our goals should be seen through 
to their end. Let's give our very best.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Chevacchi, Chevacchiii～ Are you still feeling shy? 
Sis is looking forward to seeing your photos as well, c'mon☆

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I've gotten a little used to it, but I can't help 
getting embarrassed when I do…

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, Duramente, this is really delicious～! 
Why don't you try some too～?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Hm? Is that so… In that case I will go buy one ——

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Here, ahhhhn☆

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Ah… Hmn…

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: How is it?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …Mm, it's not bad at all.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Getting to sightsee on a chartered cruiser… This place 
is truly amazing… Ah, Cheval? Huh?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: You're gonna fish!? At the resort? On a cruiser!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Um, well… this cruiser is actually capable of trawling. 
I might catch something big, so I wanted to give it a try…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Okay, that concludes everything we planned for 
the photo shoot! Good work, everyone～!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
To all the staff too, thank you for your hard work! 
…I'd like to wrap it up here with that, but ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
We still have one additional shoot to complete, right now! 
Camera crew, please get ready!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: An extra shoot…?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(…Alright, here we go. To deliver my greatest thanks 
to the ones who made the greatest photo shoot possible.)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
A collaboration between the "Satono Grand Resort" 
and Satono Crown! Feast your eyes on this magic show 
atop sunlit waters!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (Now, first up is ——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……! Shion, isn't that…?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
—— The ballet moves I showcased at the pool shoot… 
She's adopting my performance…?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(When you pushed through despite all your struggles at 
that photo shoot, you lit a fire within Cheval.)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Next is ——

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Wawah! Something jumped up just now! It's that dolphin drone I used at the ocean!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Erk, not so sure about this one. I'm still not over thinking it was a shark and trying to get away…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(Vivlos would lift everyone's spirits no matter the situation 
and brought out so many expressions from everybody…!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (Duramente ——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Amazing… each time the water sprays up, Crown appears 
in a different place… She's not cloning herself, is she…?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…I believe she is moving in sync with when the fountain 
gets stronger and obscures the view of the watertop stage 
for an instant. It is truly impressive.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(You not only inspired with your natural composure, 
but you drew the biggest shock out of me.)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (Finally… Cheval!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Waaah…! The fountain is being illuminated by the sunset…! It looks like a prism…!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(That refreshing smile of yours… is what helped us discover 
the true goal of this photo shoot… Thank you!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Now look closely, surprises are my forte! 
My gift to all of you is not over yet!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey… Chevacchi, Chevacchiiii! 
Let's check out the shops over there!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Eeh… you're still buying souvenirs…? Didn't you already 
buy a mountain's worth when we left the resort…?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha… even after the shoot they just won't calm down. 
Ah, hey, no running in the airport!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: I would like to come again someday.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…Heheh. Did you take that much of a liking to the resort? 
Were you pleased by the fitness facilities?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Indeed I have taken a liking… but it's not about that. 
I simply think… this is a place where we have made 
good memories.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Hence… why don't we participate too? 
In purchasing souvenirs. I'm sure it will 
become another memory of this trip.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…I thought this at the afterparty as well, but… you seem 
just a little different to before. Is it just me?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …Hmm. For us to push each other further, I should share my learnings with you.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: I believe this is what is known as… enjoying life is winning in life.
